items.sentence: I\'m sure that Tom didn\'t mean to hurt you.
I\'m sure that Tom won\'t let us down today.
Tom got angry when he saw Mary kissing John.
Tom got home just before it started raining.
Tom got into the car and started the engine.
Tom got out of his car and opened the trunk.
Tom didn\'t know Mary was going to be fired.
Tom didn\'t know how to apologize in French.
Tom wants something, but I\'m not sure what.
I know a lot of people who can speak French.
Let\'s talk about how this is going to work.
Let\'s talk about the deal that was reached.
Do you have any friends who don\'t eat rice?
Tom has scheduled a meeting for next Monday.
Tom has some clothes that need to be washed.
Tom has to eat his lunch in fifteen minutes.
I\'m sorry you had to get dragged into this.
I\'m sure Tom had something to do with that.
I\'m thinking of going to Australia as well.
Tom slept in the back seat while Mary drove.
